title: Canon EOS Rebel T7 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm is II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Flex Tripod + Professional Bundle
features:
Make sure this fits
                by entering your model number.
This Canon Camera Bundle comes with Manufacturer Supplied Accessories and One Year Canon USA Warranty.

Canon EOS Rebel T7 DSLR Camera - 24.1MP APS-C CMOS Sensor - DIGIC 4+ Image Processor - 3.0" 920k-Dot LCD Monitor - Full HD 1080/30p Video Recording - 9-Point AF with Center Cross-Type Point - ISO 100-6400, Up to 3 fps Shooting - Built-In Wi-Fi with NFC - Scene Intelligent Auto Mode - Creative Filters and Creative Auto Modes

Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Lens is a sleek and flexible option for everyday shooting. Spanning a 28.8-88mm equivalent focal length range, this lens covers wide-angle to portrait-length perspectives + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens + 500mm f/8 Telephoto Preset Lens
SanDisk 32GB SDHC Memory Cards, Camera Shoulder Case, Slave Flash, High Definition UV Filters, High Speed USB Card Reader
The bundle also includes many high quality accessories like HD filter kit, Monopod, Flexible spider tripod, T-Mount for 500mm Lens and more.

reviews.reviewTitle: Honestly, I couldn't be happier with this package
reviews.reviewText: For the price, I felt this was one of the best deals out there. For a beginner like me, the Canon Rebel T7 is a perfect starter camera as it gives the ability to use manual mode where you can control things like the ISO, Aperature, and shutter speed, but also several auto modes for those who just don't want handle those options. The lenses were all great; however, the 500mm felt like overkill unless you're into certain types of photography. I've been able to get some great shots with all lense. The carrying bag is also a great starter for lens storage. Really happy and excited to venture deeper into photography with this bundle.

Gave as a gift and she seems to like it a lot. Has taken pictures outside and really like the quality and ability make "blurr" photo's. Inside might need to look at some of the setting to get better quality. Looked at the retail store and got a lot better deal ordering online with the package bundle. Overall seems like a nice camera with no regrets purchasing it.
Has been using a lot more. It has quit a few features and still figuring out some of them. Takes really nice photo's.

I recieved the Canon EOS Rebal T7 camera bundle. Well packed and all in excellent condition.
Nice overall camera rig. With one exception. I was EXTREMELY disappointed in what was called a tripod. Luckily I have a good tripod. If you don't, order one with this bundle.
Everything else is of very good quality.
Looking forward to playing with it.
I still shoot 35mm & 620.

Thought this was the Rebel T7i. It is not!
Not much difference than my T6
Love this camera. Pretty easy to use. YouTube has great videos to help beginners. Came wrapped very well.

We really do love this camera. It is taking us some time to learn how to use everything that comes with it. That is just because we have never had a camera like this and are not all that tech savvy. That is the only reason for the 3 stars for easy to use. That is all on us. lol We will get there though.
This is an excellent bundle for anyone wanting a good DSR Camera with lots of extra toys. Very easy to use and is convenient for daily photography.

First off I want to state that I am a hobbyist photographer and not a professional.

This camera purchase has been nothing but great. I bought this kit and it really came with everything except a tripod, which I bought after the fact. The camera is very easy to use, and with the multiple shooting methods, both manual and preprogrammed modes, you can point and shoot or take some truly excellent photos. Having used this for over a month now, there are no real downsides. If you are in the market, I would consider this camera package.

Very pleased with this bundle and Camera! I bought it for my business and to take pictures of my kids. I've been wanting a good quality camera for years. I'm not disappointed. I do suggest reading how to use it. I was able to get it going and using it immediately, but to make full use of it you want to learn some things on DSLR cameras. They do some pretty awesome things.
Its waste of money. It doesn't take good pictures and not easy to use for beginners. Buying this camera is really disappointing and waste of $600.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great package deal for the price
reviews.reviewText: I have no dislikes as I just got it and tried it out last night for the first time. I think I need to take a course to be able to use all the features it offers. Looking forward to really using it and seeing what I can capture.
This is my first camera, it’s good beginners. Easy to learn settings.

reviews.reviewTitle: Lots of equipment for a great price.
reviews.reviewText:
My first reaction when I opened the package was somewhat disappointment. My reasoning is, I'm old school back in the day 35 mm negative film SLR. Those cameras were constructed of mostly metal bodies and well crafted. When I took the Canon DSLR out of the box I realized the body is mostly plastic and most of it molded.
Other than not having the heavy feel, I am satisfied as the picture quality seems to be there.
Perfect for a beginner or a vet!! great quality and super price!
The product came as advertised and it works great! It was a gift for my wife to start a new hobby and she is really excited. So much so I'm buying my daughter one too match
At first I missed the adapter for the 420-800 lens. I was really upset. Found it,so far, THRILLED!
I'm pretty new to photography but this was a get way to start. Everything I could need is included.

reviews.reviewTitle: There is a long time from out of the box to taking pictures...
reviews.reviewText:
This approaches professional equipment in complexity; plan to spend an afternoon -or two- assembling the camera, familiarizing with the menus, etc. before snapping you first photo!
(It's easy, just tedious.
I loved this camera. It came with all its accessories as shown in the pictures
The best part about this camera bundle is that it comes with so many things. I took beautiful pictures with it and I have no experience as a photographer.
Great quality
Amazing camera, great for beginners, excellent deal for the price comes with so many nice extras.
Pretty good for the price.
My daughter loves this camera! It’s her first camera and she is very happy with it!
Love this camera the picture quality is amazing
Enjoying my new toy. Still working on sk.e of its features

reviews.reviewTitle: Very happy with this camera bundle
reviews.reviewText: I bought thos for myself, I always wanted one, but my 15 year old son uses it more than I do! My 9 year old also uses it! Love all the extras and cant wait to get more lenses to try out!
What a great value I’m enjoying every moment
I asked a friend who is a pro photog from canada and he said the item is good and good quality aside from having a reasonablle price.
I’ve been loving this camera so far. Great for beginners easy to use. So much equipment
